# Byobu Cheat sheet

|Key binding    |Action             |
|---------------|-------------------|
|F2             |New window         |
|F3             |Previous window    |
|F4             |Next window        |
|F6             |Detach and logout  |
|F8             |Rename window      |
|F7             |Enter scroll mode  |
|Ctrl + C       |Exit scroll mode   |
|**Ctrl + F6**  |Close window       |
|Shift + F2     |New hrz pane       |
|Alt + F2       |New vrt pane       |
|Shift + F3     |Previous pane      |
|Shift + F4     |Next pane          |
|Ctrl + Arrows  |Resize pane        |
|Shift + F11    |Full screen        |
|Shift + F7     |Printscreen        |
